summary: A brother and sister are plane-wrecked in Canada, where they must rely on the help of a native and his bear.
cast: Kirsten Dunst|Zachery Ty Bryan|August Schellenberg|Dey Young|Michael Gross|Tom McBeath|Ben Cardinal|John Novak|Vincent Gale|Darren Moore|Mitchell Kosterman|Mark Acheson|Garvin Cross|Duncan Fraser|Larry Musser|Ursula
title: True Heart
